mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board(qna_seq, qna_title, qna_writer, qna_content, qna_date) VALUES(nextval('qna_board_seq'), #{qna_title}, #{qna_writer}, #{qna_content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT qna_seq, qna_writer, qna_title, qna_content, answer_title, answer_content, TO_CHAR(qna_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS qDate, TO_CHAR(qna_date,'HH12:MI AM') AS qTime FROM qna_board ORDER BY qna_seq DESC

SELECT qna_seq, qna_writer, qna_title, qna_content, answer_title, answer_content, TO_CHAR(qna_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS qDate, TO_CHAR(qna_date,'HH12:MI AM') AS qTime FROM qna_board WHERE qna_seq = #{qna_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate) VALUES(nextval('seq_reply_rno'), #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, TO_CHAR(replydate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rDate, TO_CHAR(replydate,'HH12:MI AM') AS rTime FROM reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY replydate
SELECT notify_seq, notify_writer, notify_title, notify_content, TO_CHAR(notify_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS nDate, TO_CHAR(notify_date,'HH12:MI AM') AS nTime FROM notify_board ORDER BY notify_seq DESC
